Sentencas: Four coal-based power plants were evaluated with respect to their capacity to produce CO2 for Enhanced Oil Recovery (EOR).
Titulo: Evaluation of CO2 production for enhanced oil recovery from four power plants

Sentencas: The plant characteristics were evaluated using energy and exergoeconomic criteria and a robust coal gasification/combustion mathematical model that can predict temperature, converted fraction and particle size distribution for solids have been used for a high pressure fluidized bed.
Titulo: Evaluation of CO2 production for enhanced oil recovery from four power plants

Sentencas: Other models based on Python, Aspen Hysys and Microsoft Excel have been used too.
Titulo: Evaluation of CO2 production for enhanced oil recovery from four power plants

Sentencas: Integrating carbon sequestration reduces the global energy and exergy efficiencies of all power plants (up to 10%).
Titulo: Evaluation of CO2 production for enhanced oil recovery from four power plants

Sentencas: However, the Integrated Gasification Combined Cycle (IGCC) is a promising technology utilizing coal for generating electrical energy and direct compression of CO2 (11-20 MPa).
Titulo: Evaluation of CO2 production for enhanced oil recovery from four power plants

Sentencas: Similarly, integrating gasification with Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC), allows for the pre-combustion capture of CO2, with the advantage of lower initial investment costs.
Titulo: Evaluation of CO2 production for enhanced oil recovery from four power plants

Sentencas: The oxy-fuel combustion (OXY) plant offers high energy and exergy efficiencies, but the exergoeconomic cost of CO2 is increased by 31 USD/t as compared to IGCC.
Titulo: Evaluation of CO2 production for enhanced oil recovery from four power plants

Sentencas: The conventional thermoelectric (CT) plant exhibit disadvantages due to their simple power cycle and the elevated initial investment costs.
Titulo: Evaluation of CO2 production for enhanced oil recovery from four power plants

Sentencas: This suggests that coal-gasification based plants are the best alternatives for CO2 production for EOR and co-generated electrical power.
Titulo: Evaluation of CO2 production for enhanced oil recovery from four power plants
